modName: Magicka Sabers Crystal - Meetra Surik Grey Face Fix
summary: Meetra Surik has a grey face. This mod fixes that.
descriptionHtml:
Fixes Meetra Surik's grey face for Magicka Sabers Crystal mod. Meetra Surik is the vendor in Whiterun.

The grey face bug has been around for a month or so, and I finally got tired of it and decided to fix it.

This mod only contains meshes and textures for Meetra's face.


-Required Mod-
Magicka Sabers Crystal by Aberation
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10517/?

All credit goes to Aberation.
author: PhoenixSky

files.name: MagickaSabersCrystal - Meetra Surik Grey Face Fix
